titles.title: Small Business Contracting Credit Act of 2019
To amend the Small Business Act to give small business contracting credit for subcontractors that are Puerto Rico businesses, and for other purposes.
Small Business Contracting Credit Act of 2019

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Small Business.

bill.summary:
Small Business Contracting Credit Act of 2019
This bill authorizes federal agencies to double the value of contracts awarded to Puerto Rican subcontractors for the purpose of obtaining credit towards the small business prime contracting goal.
